permissions: Admins and users visible via BrokerTenderPolicy::Scope (broker members of the buyer broker, customer managers with customer-managed trucker relationships to the seller, and trucker managers/drivers with rate access for non-editing tenders). Rates and payment_terms fields are hidden unless the user is an admin, broker member, managed trucker member, or customer member with a direct trucker relationship.
validation_notes: Requires a broker tender ID argument.
